welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chelsea, where historic buildings, quaint shops and delicious restaurants await you. Take a stroll through our beautiful streets and discover the unique charm that makes our city a must-visit destination."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves as a hub for JetBlue and other domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Dedicated for international flights and serves as a hub for international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Lawrence Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and has a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Lawrence Airport is primarily used for international flights and has a duty-free shop and currency exchange services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
